parkingRobot

Interface INavigation

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    NavigationAT

    public interface INavigation
    interface for the main module 'Navigation', providing methods for estimation of the robot position, its heading angle and information about detected parking slots.

    It contains the subclass INavigation.ParkingSlot to provide a reasonable data structure to the cooperating classes containing all relevant information for one parking slot detected by the Navigation class.

    Author:
    IfA

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Interface and Description
      static class  INavigation.ParkingSlot
      represents one entry in the parking slot data bank.

      INavigation.ParkingSlot[] getParkingSlots()
      returns references to all known parking slot classes with information about ID, status, start position and end position

      returns bundled current X and Y location and heading angle phi
      void setDetectionState(boolean isOn)
      switches parking slot detection on or off.
      void setMap(Line[] map)
      set the map of the line the robot follows while searching for parking slots
      void updateNavigation()
      initiates a new and actual computation/detection of all relevant Navigation members, especially robot pose and parking slots (last, if their detection is activated)

    • Method Detail

      • setMap

        void setMap(Line[] map)
        set the map of the line the robot follows while searching for parking slots
        Parameters:
        map - array of line references, whose corresponding lines form a closed chain and represent the map of the robot course

      • setDetectionState

        void setDetectionState(boolean isOn)
        switches parking slot detection on or off. While a parking maneuver active parking slot detection can lead to unexpected parking slot initializations or measurements. The detection should only be activated while the robot is in an explicit parking slot search state.
        Parameters:
        isOn - indicates if parking slot detection should be switched on (true) or off (false)

      • updateNavigation

        void updateNavigation()
        initiates a new and actual computation/detection of all relevant Navigation members, especially robot pose and parking slots (last, if their detection is activated)

      • getPose

        Pose getPose()
        returns bundled current X and Y location and heading angle phi
        Returns:
        pose class containing pose at time of last computation

      • getParkingSlots

        INavigation.ParkingSlot[] getParkingSlots()
        returns references to all known parking slot classes with information about ID, status, start position and end position
        Returns:
        array of all known parking space class references

      • getCorner

        boolean getCorner()
        Getter method for other modules to decide whether there is a corner or not
        Returns:
        Corner detected --> true, No Corner --> false

      • getLastCornerNumber

        int getLastCornerNumber()
        Getter method for other modules to get the ID of the last corner
        Returns:
        ID of the last detected corner

      • getNextCornerNumber

        int getNextCornerNumber()
        Getter method for other modules to get the ID of the next Corner the robot will reach
        Returns:
        ID of the next corner

      • getCornerArea

        boolean getCornerArea()
        Checks whether the robot is in the near of a corner or not.
        Returns:
        safety: true if a corner is close, false if not

      • getCornerIndex

        int getCornerIndex()
        Returns:
        corner index

      • getCornerType

        boolean getCornerType()
        Gives information about the Type of the Corner
        Returns:
        true if a left corner is close, false if a right corner is close

      • getNumberOfSlots

        int getNumberOfSlots()
